SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.phonytive.astive.agi.annotation
Annotation Type Parameter

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface Parameter

Annotation use to mark an field as a command parameter.

Keep in mind, that if a parameter is marked as optional and set as null any subsequent parameter will be ignored.

Since:
1.0.0

Optional Element Summary
 boolean optional
          Return whether or not a parameter is optional.
 short position
          Get the position of this parameter in a command.
 java.lang.String prefix
          Get the prefix of the parameter or and empty string is none is defined.
 

position

public abstract short position
Get the position of this parameter in a command. The position should be repeated or an AgiException will be thrown.

Returns:
position of this parameter in a command. Default position is 0.
Default:
0

prefix

public abstract java.lang.String prefix
Get the prefix of the parameter or and empty string is none is defined.

Returns:
prefix of the parameter.
Default:
""

optional

public abstract boolean optional
Return whether or not a parameter is optional.

Returns:
true if parameter is option or false otherwise.
Default:
true
